author: esm
msg: Hacked the resource manifest model, allowing us to add missing POM information in the remote-resources.xml file.  In order to allow building from a clean local repository, and to prevent circular dependencies, the plugin configuration had to be added to each child.
Keeping this plugin seperate from the maven-pluto-plugin will allow us to easily remove it in the future if need be.
